name: My Little Pony: The Movie
summary: Join the ponies as they try to stay one step ahead, fearlessly (for the most part!) facing kidnappers, whirlpools, and runaway windmills! Will the Magic of Friendship prevail when the Mane 6, a small band of swashbuckling parrot pirates, an undersea princess, and a foe turned friend are all that stands between Equestria and certain doom?
